components.name: Onezone
components.description: Onezone API allows to control all aspects of a Onedata zone, including user, group, space and provider management.

components.name: Oneprovider
components.description: Oneprovider API allows to access data and control data transfers and provides extensive metadata functionality.

components.name: Onepanel
components.description: Onepanel API provides administration interface for managing Onezone and Oneprovider instances, it is available on each host where either of these service is running.

components.name: LUMA
components.description: LUMA API allows mapping of local user names on storage resources to global users ID's in Onedata
